DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect manual acupuncture electro-acupuncture labour pain .
DOC.detailed_description: Acupuncture use obstetric care spite insufficient evidence potential reduce labour pain . The finding far contradictory , may reflect methodological limitation . The present study take issue account , sufficiently large sample allow detection possible difference study group ; optimal timing intervention ; control intensity treatment ; qualified training person give treatment ; biological marker pain stress ; possible effect mother infant ; woman 's experience overall birth experience memory pain .
DOC.criteria: Admission labour ward spontaneous onset labour Latent active phase labour Nulliparity Singleton pregnancy , cephalic presentation Gestation : 37+0 41+6 ( week + day ) Expressed need labour pain relief Swedish speaking ( well enough understand write oral instruction ) No pharmacological pain relief within 24 hour prior inclusion study Severe preeclampsia Treatment oxytocin time point allocation Treatment anticoagulant Pacemaker
